mapper.select: SELECT mut.trainer_user_matching_code AS 'trainerUserMatchingCode', mut.user_id AS 'userId' FROM tb_matching_user_trainer AS mut INNER JOIN tb_notice_promotion_trainer AS npt ON mut.trainer_promotion_notice_code = npt.trainer_promotion_notice_code where mut.trainer_promotion_notice_code =#{promotionCode};

SELECT u.user_id AS 'userId', u.user_first_height AS 'userFirstHeight', u.user_first_weight AS 'userFirstWeight', u.user_first_goal AS 'userFirstGoal'
FROM tb_matching_user_trainer AS mut INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON mut.user_id = #{userId};
